alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 12:45AM CST until January 12 at 1:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM CST FOR CRAIGHEAD AND POINSETT COUNTIES... At 1244 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greenfield, or near Jonesboro, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Fire Department. At 1240 AM CST quarter size hail was reported in Wiener. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Trumann, Harrisburg, Bono, Bay, Brookland, Weiner, Cash, Egypt, Waldenburg, Greenfield, Fisher, Hergett, Apt, Valley View, Weona, Gum Point, Farrville, Dorothy, and Maple Grove. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
